name: "80 Proofreader"
flavor: Correction by erasure.

name: "Act on Instinct"
flavor: There's never time to think.

name: "Aries Ascendant"
flavor: The bull smells battle.

name: "Armor of Vows"
flavor: Unity makes us invincible.

name: "Aspect of Glass"
flavor: You fly unbound beneath eternity.

name: "Atalanta's Hunt"
flavor: Never stop for golden apples.

name: "Aurora Lance"
flavor: The breath of suns.

name: "Bane of Dark Gods"
flavor: "I stand defiant."

name: "Belisarius Defiant"
flavor: There's only one legitimate authority in this system.

name: "Birth of History"
flavor: Go forth and conquer.

name: "Chasing Infinity"
flavor: The Queen speaks softly, and carries a big fleet.

name: "Comitatus"
flavor: Forge a new fellowship.

name: "Crypt Hammer"
flavor: After death – triumph.

name: "Draught of Nectar"
flavor: "Does one life across infinite realities equal immortal life?" —Parables of the Allspring

name: "Dream Eater"
flavor: I think she's hungry.

name: "Eon Trespass"
flavor: Born from the mind of Elsie Bray, three years before she disappeared.

name: "Ether Eater"
flavor: Swift and bright and precious.

name: "Extinction Event"
flavor: Dodging the Permian bullet.

name: "Fatal Vision"
flavor: Come, let me clutch thee.

name: "Glass Minuet"
flavor: The Vault whispers of a world beyond.

name: "Gloriole Jump"
flavor: The light of NLS travel can be hypnotic.

name: "Hebridean Thoughtcrime"
flavor: What were you thinking?

name: "High and Flighty"
flavor: Can't ever tie me down.

name: "Karuna, Falling"
flavor: There is nothing more ruthless than compassion.

name: "Ketch Me If You Can"
flavor: Fallen piracy is a perpetual risk during jumps between the inner planets.

name: "Kondratyuk's Escape"
flavor: For those who would break free.

name: "Laughing Behind Your Back"
flavor: There's nothing funnier than terrestrial life…

name: "Light in the Abyss"
flavor: From out of the dark, up into the light...

name: "Little Light"
flavor: "That's not funny."

name: "Made of Shakespeare"
flavor: "I count myself a king of infinite space."

name: "Mind Bleacher"
flavor: Imagine the crowds. Then block them out.

name: "Newsbreaker"
flavor: And now, the latest -

name: "Outrageous Fortune"
flavor: Who needs slings and arrows?

name: "Plasma Donor"
flavor: Ready for a tactical injection.

name: "Quite Content Damsel"
flavor: No knights, please.

name: "Ripship Pardoner"
flavor: In vacuum, fire flows like water.

name: "Rope to Heaven"
flavor: Be wary of what you find between the stars. Demons have breached the gates where once only angels dared.

name: "Scorpio Miracle"
flavor: Hope from on high.

name: "Seraphim Toaster"
flavor: Angels are a navigational hazard.

name: "Shark Whisperer"
flavor: No, ship, that's not a seal...

name: "Sidereal Rumba"
flavor: Join the eternal dance.

name: "Smokehouse Six"
flavor: It goes boom.

name: "Steel Atreus"
flavor: Some day we'll dance our little dance to the end...but not today. Not today.

name: "Sun Current"
flavor: "He bathed in the sun's light, and it burned away his fear, and his hope." —Parables of the Allspring

name: "The Climb"
flavor: There is nothing else.

name: "The Dirigible Incorrigible"
flavor: The price is negligible.

name: "The Fangs of Nyx"
flavor: Beware her maw.

name: "The Fermi Solution"
flavor: We are not alone.

name: "The Road Unraveled"
flavor: Take out the stitches. Start over.

name: "The Teilhard War"
flavor: All things converge.

name: "The Visible Hand"
flavor: Lead from the front.

name: "Ticktock Inquisitor"
flavor: Time is very short...

name: "Tiger Tiger"
flavor: The stars my destination.

name: "Tropos Gardener"
flavor: Change needs careful tending.

name: "Vacuum Diagram"
flavor: Infinity awaits us.

name: "Vienna Singer"
flavor: RHO-8a Teng Tactical Combatant

name: "Vintage Russian Soul"
flavor: The old blood of Murmansk.

name: AFv1 Octavian
flavor: The AFv1 Octavian is an advanced Phaeton-class, long range jumpship. Upgraded for improved performance and style, the Octavian is as close to the Phaeton's original factory specs as resources will allow.

name: AFv2 Octavian
flavor: The AFv2 Octavian is a variant of the advanced Phaeton-class, long range jumpship. Upgraded for improved performance and style, the Octavian is as close to the Phaeton's original factory specs as resources will allow.

name: AFv3 Octavian
flavor: The AFv3 Octavian is a variant of the advanced Phaeton-class, long range jumpship. Upgraded for improved performance and style, the Octavian is as close to the Phaeton's original factory specs as resources will allow.

name: Agonarch Karve
flavor: "Life is pain. Pain is power. And power is life." —Toland, the Shattered

name: Arcadia Class Jumpship
flavor: Arcadians were the most common jumpships during the Golden Age, used for both terrestrial and planetary excursions. Their remains have been reported around most Earth-based space ports.

name: AX19 Slipper Misfit
flavor: The AX19 Slipper Misfit is an advanced Kestrel-class jumpship, upgraded using breakthroughs in design theory.

name: AX19 Spindle Demon
flavor: The AX19 Spindle Demon is a variant of the Kestrel-class experimental jumpship rigged for extreme performance.

name: Ceres Galliot
flavor: Long-range ships designed to patrol the Reef and beyond.

name: Coldsnap BKR
flavor: A refurbished blockade runner, customized with the Fallen House of Winter's sigil, given as a trophy to those who brave the Prison of Elders.

name: CX20 Slipper Misfit
flavor: The CX20 Slipper Misfit is an advanced Kestrel-class jumpship, upgraded using breakthroughs in design theory.

name: CX20 Spindle Demon
flavor: The CX20 Spindle Demon is a variant of the Kestrel-class experimental jumpship rigged for extreme performance.

name: Devils' Due BKR
flavor: A refurbished blockade runner, customized with the Fallen House of Devils' sigil, given as a trophy to those who brave the Prison of Elders.

name: EX21 Slipper Misfit
flavor: The EX21 Slipper Misfit is an advanced Kestrel-class jumpship, upgraded using breakthroughs in design theory.

name: EX21 Spindle Demon
flavor: The EX21 Spindle Demon is a variant of the Kestrel-class experimental jumpship rigged for extreme performance.

name: Hildian Seeker
flavor: Nimble starfighters designed by the Reef to navigate dense asteroid fields.

name: Kestrel Class AX
flavor: Base model experimental jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

name: Kestrel Class AX0
flavor: Base model experimental jumpship. The Kestrel is thought to have been a prototype long-range craft designed near the end of the Golden Age. Most in service are rebuilt using reverse-engineered specs.

name: Kestrel Class CX
flavor: Base model experimental jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

name: Kestrel Class CX0
flavor: Base model experimental jumpship. The Kestrel is thought to have been a prototype long-range craft designed near the end of the Golden Age. Most in service are rebuilt using reverse-engineered specs.

name: Kestrel Class EX
flavor: Base model experimental jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

name: Kestrel Class EX0
flavor: Base model experimental jumpship. The Kestrel is thought to have been a prototype long-range craft designed near the end of the Golden Age. Most in service are rebuilt using reverse-engineered specs.

name: Kingslayer BKR
flavor: A refurbished blockade runner, customized with the Fallen House of Kings' sigil, given as a trophy to those who brave the Prison of Elders.

name: Last Battle
flavor: "Eliksni once ruled many stars. Now we fight for one not our own." —Variks

name: Longest Vigil
flavor: "I am last of my House. I will not forget." —Variks

name: Lost Legacy
flavor: "We were not prepared to withstand the Whirlwind. No one is." —Variks

name: LRv1 Javelin
flavor: The LRv1 Javelin is a standard Phaeton-class long range jumpship. Refurbished and rigged for dangerous flight.

name: LRv2 Javelin
flavor: The LRv2 Javelin is a variant of the standard Phaeton-class, long range jumpship. Refurbished and rigged for dangerous flight.

name: LRv3 Javelin
flavor: The LRv3 Javelin is a variant of the standard Phaeton-class, long range jumpship. Refurbished and rigged for dangerous flight.

name: Manus Celer Dei
flavor: NON FACETE NOBIS CALCITRARE VESTRVM PERINÆVM

name: NS22 Cloud Errant
flavor: The NS22 Cloud Errant is a standard Regulus-class "near-star" jumpship. Refurbished for more efficient energy flow among its systems and ready for flight.

name: NS22 High Water
flavor: The NS22 High Water is an advanced Regulus-class "near-star" jumpship. Re-worked specs include a range module and improved defensive array.

name: NS44 Cloud Errant
flavor: The NS44 Cloud Errant is a variant of the standard Regulus-class "near-star" jumpship. Refurbished for more efficient energy flow among its systems and ready for flight.

name: NS44 High Water
flavor: The NS44 High Water is a variant of the advanced Regulus-class "near-star" jumpship. Re-worked specs include a range module and improved defensive array.

name: NS66 Cloud Errant
flavor: The NS66 Cloud Errant is a variant of the standard Regulus-class "near-star" jumpship. Refurbished for more efficient energy flow among its systems and ready for flight.

name: NS66 High Water
flavor: The NS66 High Water is a variant of the advanced Regulus-class "near-star" jumpship. Re-worked specs include a range module and improved defensive array.

name: Phaeton Class v1
flavor: Base model long range jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

name: Phaeton Class v1.1
flavor: Base model long range jumpship. Phaetons are sturdy and reliable, though the basic class models are rebuilt below spec, due to limited supplies and high demand.

name: Phaeton Class v2
flavor: Base model long range jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

name: Phaeton Class v2.1
flavor: Base model long range jumpship. Phaetons are sturdy and reliable, though the basic class models are rebuilt below spec, due to limited supplies and high demand.

name: Phaeton Class v3
flavor: Base model long range jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

name: Phaeton Class v3.1
flavor: Base model long range jumpship. Phaetons are sturdy and reliable, though the basic class models are rebuilt below spec, due to limited supplies and high demand.

name: Regulus Class 22a
flavor: Base model "near-star" jumpship. The Regulus was originally built for speed and maneuverability, but the basic class models rely on limited resources and rarely reach full spec.

name: Regulus Class 44b
flavor: Base model "near-star" jumpship. The Regulus was originally built for speed and maneuverability, but the basic class models rely on limited resources and rarely reach full spec.

name: Regulus Class 55
flavor: Base model "near-star" jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

name: Regulus Class 66c
flavor: Base model "near-star" jumpship. The Regulus was originally built for speed and maneuverability, but the basic class models rely on limited resources and rarely reach full spec.

name: Regulus Class 77
flavor: Base model "near-star" jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

name: Regulus Class 99
flavor: Base model "near-star" jumpship. Ships capable of interplanetary travel are in limited supply. Most are never rebuilt to anything resembling their Golden Age glory.

name: Space-Age Mariner
flavor: Planets, planets, every where, nor any to call home.

name: Valkyrie-O5X
flavor: The Valkyrie-O5X is a pet project of Tower Shipwright, Amanda Holliday. Refurbished from choice parts for far-reaching exploration.

name: Waning Star
flavor: "Not Eliksni, no… but true Kell and Queen. House Judgment honors her." —Variks

name: Wolf Hunter BKR
flavor: A refurbished blockade runner, customized with the Fallen House of Wolves' sigil, given as a trophy to those who brave the Prison of Elders.

name: Nanophoenix
flavor: All destruction is an act of creation. And vice versa.
